title: Tim Wallace (rugby union)
text:
Timothy (Tim) Mark Wallace (born 29 March 1969, in <a href="Sydney">Sydney</a>) is a former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who played with the Australian national team and <a href="NSW%20Waratahs">NSW Waratahs</a>.
Wallace played two tests for Australia as fly half against Italy in 1994, scoring 20 points.
